**Tool**: G-Map             
**Created**: 05-2016                      
**By**:Dennis van Muijen en David Nieuwehuijse                
**Version**: 0.1 test version                    
**Email**: dennis.vanmuijen@wur.nl, d.nieuwehuijse@erasmusmc.nl               
**Platform**: R Shiny               

**Usage**
Interactive application for genetic map construction and qtl mapping based on
R packages ASmap and qtl. Currently only the analysis of the RIL population used
for the Distance learning course is supported.
